name: Google Image Search: Mac OS X Snow Leopard
description:
Google Image Search powered by Mac OS X.

Use with modified Autopagerize by os0x which makes Google Image Search autopargerize-able: http://github.com/os0x/autopagerize/tree/master

Check out my other styles for Google:
style 18188
style 17791
style 16900
